home.quote: There is no disease in a healthy body. Your body is wise.
home.floating_desc: Awakening your inner healer without dependencies.
home.prog_edu_desc: Lectures on life philosophy and nutrition.
home.prog_eco_desc: Farm visits, lodging, and nature contact.
home.prog_home_desc: Therapies and diagnosis in your home in Bogota.
home.pillar_1_desc: Urine therapy moves and strengthens the immune system.
home.cta_title: Start your path to a full life

about.alicia_desc: Expert homeopathic therapist from Bogota. Biomagnetism, Reiki, and Acupuncture.

program.edu_intro: Education is the foundation of true health. It's not just about curing symptoms, but understanding the philosophy of life.
program.edu_content: Based on the teachings of Dr. Atom Inoe. We approach health from a holistic perspective, teaching 'Urohealth' (Urine Therapy) as the queen of natural therapies. We also explore detachment, acceptance of natural death, and conscious nutrition.
program.eco_intro: Biosalud Farm in Anolaima is not a hotel, it is a home. A space to reconnect with Pachamama.
program.eco_content: We offer a total immersion experience in nature. The 'Natural Hospital' is the environment itself: fresh water, sun, earth, and silence. Visitors participate in farm life, learning about organic farming and sharing food harvested from our garden.
program.eco_feat_1: Family lodging in a rural setting.
program.eco_feat_4: Experiential workshops on planting and harvesting.
program.home_intro: When pain prevents movement, Biosalud comes to your home. We bring oriental and bioenergetic therapy to you.
program.home_content: Designed for patients with reduced mobility or acute pain. Dr. Alicia Cabrera and the team perform an on-site comprehensive diagnosis. We use non-invasive therapies like Biomagnetism (Magnets), Acupuncture, and the 'Gyaooo' method for quick bone and muscle adjustments.
program.home_feat_2: Pain Therapy with Magnets and Acupuncture.
